tool_description: Identifies weather patterns and anomalies in time series data to detect drought, excessive rainfall, heat waves, and other agriculturally significant events.

weather_variable.description: Weather variable to analyze: temperature, precipitation, or humidity

detection_sensitivity.description: Sensitivity level: low, medium, or high

error_messages: Insufficient data points: Need at least 30 data points for reliable pattern detection.
Data quality issues: Remove outliers or fill missing values before analysis.
usage: Provide weather variable type and time series data. Set detection sensitivity to control pattern identification threshold. Returns identified patterns and their agricultural significance.

pattern_strength.description: Strength scores for each detected pattern (0-1)

anomaly_periods.description: Date ranges of anomalous weather periods
